name: the survey (itch) (potato)
description:
here we go,

this game is a quick game I made for the jam.

I hope you enjoy it.

controls:

mouse button.

I joined the jam late soo sorry for it being unpolished.

so, originally there would be an RPG battle but as helper Wesley said "things take longer than what you expect" -Wesley 2022

well, I hid two secrets in the game hehe. but if you didn't find the secret in your first playthrough, you probably won't in the second.

I guess that's all
